Ride your very own Freestyle bike in "BMX VR," the ultimate VR biking game! Master the game's realistic physics to land the sickest Freestyle BMX tricks. Customize every aspect of your bike and rider and try to land the most insane tricks you can think of! 

üö¥ REALISTIC BMX PHYSICS üö¥
Grip the handlebars and hit the park! With realistic BMX physics, you will feel like you are actually landing awesome tricks from wheelies to barspins & even grinds & tail whips.

üîß CUSTOMIZE EVERY DETAIL üîß
Change the weight, speed, and feel of your bike with unlimited combinations of bike parts! Bars, frames, seats, wheels, breaks, pegs, pedals, and much more! Build your dream BMX to fit your riding style with extensive customization options for your bike and rider.

üåç FOUR UNIQUE MAPS üåç
Explore fourdiverse maps! Test your bike in the bike shop practice facility or take your skills to the huge Pro BMX Park! Free ride in the downtown city map or the school campus, or take your BMX off road in Forest trails pump track. Each offers unique challenges and opportunities for freestyle and free riding! And more coming soon!

üé¢ TRICKS AND FREESTYLE üé¢

BMX puts you in control of your fully customized bike in a virtual open world! Master the bikes realistic physics and land the wildest tricks in the ultimate VR BMX game!
